tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LoyaltyProgramData (
    loyalty_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL,
    purchase_date DATE,
    loyalty_points INT
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    purchase_amount DECIMAL,
    purchase_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES loyalty_program_data(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    transaction_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES customer(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE purchase_history (
    customer_id INT,
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    purchase_date DATE,
    total_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES loyalty_program_data(customer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE redeemed_rewards (
    customer_id INT,
    reward_id INT,
    redemption_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES loyalty_program_data(customer_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (reward_id) REFERENCES rewards_catalog(reward_id)
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    customer_id INT,
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    feedback_category VARCHAR,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (customer_id) REFERENCES loyalty_program_data(customer_id)
);
